answers.author: Alexandra Iannolo
answers.text:
Hello,
I found some examples of non-profit partnerships from Knowledge Network members.
One 2010 ICMA Community Partnership Award Nominee from North Port, Florida was recognized for their successful Family Service Center. Their program incorporated 12 local non-profit organizations to make the center more efficient.
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/302425/2010_ICMA_Community_Partnership_Award_Nominee__Family_Service_Center
A program in Indianapolis improves local public art efforts by working with an area non-profit for the arts.
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/13181
I have also included a Knowledge Network question and its answer about partnering with non-profit organizations to help finance public pools.
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/questions/kn/Question/20841/Partner_wPrivate_Nonprofit_for_FinancingOperation_PoolAquatic_Centers
In another example of collaboration Arlington, Texas has established a program where retired  city buses are donated to non-profits.
http://icma.org/en/Article/11700/City_of_Arlington_Texas_Bus_Donation_Program
Another document you might find helpful is, Improving the Non-Profit, Voluntary and Charitable Sector's Effectiveness in Influencing Decisions of Government.
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/301877/Improving_the_NonProfit_Voluntary_and_Charitable_Sectors_Effectiveness_in_Influencing_Decisions_of_G
Also, I included an article called, Keys to Collaboration: Building Effective Public-Private Partnerships.
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/302220
I hope these are helpful!
Ali Iannolo
Knowledge Network Intern
aiannolo@gmail.com

author: Brian Knudsen
text:
Are their examples of policies for city staff working with non-profit organizations?  I am specifically looking for any guidelines or restrictions that dictate what staff may or may not do when working with other agencies.
thank you.
title: Non-profit collaboration
